--- title: "Braintree Public Schools" author: "Theresa Szczepanski" desription: "Overview of BPS Population and Enrollment" date: "12/05/2022" format: html: df-print: paged toc: true code-fold: true code-copy: true code-tools: true categories: - Theresa_Szczepanski - Brantiree_Public_Schools --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(ggplot2) library(lubridate) library(readxl) library(hrbrthemes) library(viridis) library(ggpubr) library(purrr) library(plotly) knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE) ``` ::: ## Challenge Overview ### Read in data Read in Enrollment by Selected Populations ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_2017 <- read_excel("_data/Braintree Public Schools/Selected Populations Reports (School).xlsx", sheet = "2017-2018", skip = 2, col_names= c("School Name", "School Code", "First Language Not English", "% First Language Not English","English Language Learners", "% English Language Learners","Students with Disabilities", "% Students with Disabilities", "delete", "delete", "delete", "delete", "delete","delete", "High Needs", "% High Needs", "Economically Disadvantaged", "% Economically Disadvantaged")) %>% select(!contains("delete")) BPS_Selected_Pops_Current <- read_excel("_data/Braintree Public Schools/Selected Populations Reports (School).xlsx",sheet = "2022-2023", skip = 1)%>% select(`School Name`, `First Language Not English #`, `First Language Not English %`, `English Language Learner #`,`English Language Learner %`, `Students With Disabilities #`, `Students With Disabilities %`, contains("#...16"), contains("Low"))%>% filter(str_detect(`School Name`,"Braintree"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Braintree High"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Middle"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Quab"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Monat"))%>% mutate(`High Needs %` = `High Needs #...16`) BPS_Selected_Pops_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: Read in Enrollment by Grade ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current <- read_excel("_data/Braintree Public Schools/Enrollment by Grade (School).xlsx",sheet = "2022-2023", skip = 1)%>% select(`School Name`, `1.0`,`2.0`, `3.0`, `4.0`)%>% filter(str_detect(`School Name`,"Braintree"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Braintree High"))%>% pivot_longer(c(2:5), names_to ="Grade Level", values_to = "Enrollment Grade Level") #view(BPS_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current) BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current<-BPS_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Middle"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Quab"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Monat"))%>% mutate(`Current MS` = case_when( !str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands") ~ "East", str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands") ~ "South"))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS` = case_when( !str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Flaherty") ~ "East", str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Flaherty") ~ "South"))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS2` = case_when( !str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Morrison") ~ "East", str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Morrison") ~ "South")) view(BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current) ``` ::: Proposed 2026 Enrollment for Middle Schools ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_2026_Elementary_Feeding<-BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current%>% group_by(`Current MS`, `School Name`,`Proposed MS`, `Proposed MS2`)%>% filter(str_detect(`Grade Level`, "1|2|3|4"))%>% summarize(Sending_Pop_2026 = sum(`Enrollment Grade Level`, na.rm=TRUE)) MS_Current_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-BPS_2026_Elementary_Feeding%>% group_by(`Current MS`)%>% summarize(MS_Current_2026_Enrollment = sum(`Sending_Pop_2026`, na.rm=TRUE)) BPS_2026_Proposed_Elementary_Feeding<-BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current%>% group_by(`Proposed MS`, `School Name`)%>% filter(str_detect(`Grade Level`, "1|2|3|4"))%>% summarize(Sending_Pop_2026 = sum(`Enrollment Grade Level`, na.rm=TRUE)) MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-BPS_2026_Proposed_Elementary_Feeding%>% group_by(`Proposed MS`)%>% summarize(MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment = sum(`Sending_Pop_2026`, na.rm=TRUE)) BPS_2026_Proposed2_Elementary_Feeding<-BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current%>% group_by(`Proposed MS2`, `School Name`)%>% filter(str_detect(`Grade Level`, "1|2|3|4"))%>% summarize(Sending_Pop_2026 = sum(`Enrollment Grade Level`, na.rm=TRUE)) MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-BPS_2026_Proposed2_Elementary_Feeding%>% group_by(`Proposed MS2`)%>% summarize(MS2_Proposed_2026_Enrollment = sum(`Sending_Pop_2026`, na.rm=TRUE)) BPS_2026_Elementary_Feeding ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_2026_Projected_Enrollment ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'MS_2026_Projected_Enrollment' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-left_join(MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment, BPS_2026_Elementary_Feeding, "Proposed MS") MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment%>% mutate(`%MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment` = round(Sending_Pop_2026/MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment,2)) MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment%>% left_join(MS_2026_Projected_Enrollment, "Current MS") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in is.data.frame(y): object 'MS_2026_Projected_Enrollment' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment%>% mutate(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment` = round(Sending_Pop_2026/MS_2026_Enrollment,2)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in `mutate()`: ! Problem while computing `%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment = round(Sending_Pop_2026/MS_2026_Enrollment, 2)`. Caused by error in `mask$eval_all_mutate()`: ! object 'MS_2026_Enrollment' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} view(MS_Proposed_2026_Project_Enrollment) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in view(MS_Proposed_2026_Project_Enrollment): object 'MS_Proposed_2026_Project_Enrollment' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-left_join(MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment, BPS_2026_Elementary_Feeding, "Proposed MS2") MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment%>% mutate(`%MS_Proposed2_2026_Enrollment` = round(Sending_Pop_2026/MS2_Proposed_2026_Enrollment,2)) MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment%>% left_join(MS_2026_Projected_Enrollment, "Current MS") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in is.data.frame(y): object 'MS_2026_Projected_Enrollment' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment<-MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment%>% # mutate(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment` = round(Sending_Pop_2026/MS_2026_Enrollment,2)) MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Enrollment_Options<-MS_Proposed2_2026_Projected_Enrollment%>% select(`School Name`, `MS2_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`, `%MS_Proposed2_2026_Enrollment`)%>% left_join(MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment, "School Name") MS_Enrollment_Options ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Enrollment_Options<-MS_Enrollment_Options%>% select(`School Name`, `Sending_Pop_2026`, `Current MS`, `MS_2026_Enrollment`, `%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment`, `Proposed MS`, `MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`, `%MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`,`Proposed MS2`, `MS2_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`, `%MS_Proposed2_2026_Enrollment` ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in `select()`: ! Can't subset columns that don't exist. ✖ Column `MS_2026_Enrollment` doesn't exist. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} MS_Enrollment_Options ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: Read in/Tidy Enrollment by Race/Gender ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Race <- read_excel("_data/Braintree Public Schools/Enrollment by Race_Gender Report.xlsx",sheet = "2022-2023", skip = 1)%>% select(`School Name`, `African American`, `Asian`, `Hispanic`,`White`, `Native American`, `Native Hawaiian, Pacific Islander`, `Multi-Race, Non-Hispanic`)%>% filter(str_detect(`School Name`,"Braintree"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Braintree Highschool"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Middle"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Quab"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Monat"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Braintree High"))%>% mutate(`Current MS` = case_when( !str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands") ~ "East", str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands") ~ "South"))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS` = case_when( !str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Flaherty") ~ "East", str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Flaherty") ~ "South"))%>% pivot_longer(c(2:8), names_to ="Race", values_to = "% Race Sending")%>% mutate(`% Race Sending`= `% Race Sending`/100) Proposed_East_2026_Enrollment<-BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Race%>% group_by(`Proposed MS`)%>% summarise() (BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Race) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: Join Total Proposed Enrollment with Race Data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} Enrollment_Total_Race_Test<-BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Race%>% select(!contains("MS"))%>% left_join(MS_Proposed_2026_Projected_Enrollment, "School Name")%>% mutate(`%Race_Current_MS` = round(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment`*`% Race Sending`,2))%>% mutate(`%Race_Proposed_MS` = round(`%MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`*`% Race Sending`,2)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in `mutate()`: ! Problem while computing `%Race_Current_MS = round(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment` * `% Race Sending`, 2)`. Caused by error in `mask$eval_all_mutate()`: ! object '%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} Enrollment_Total_Race_Test ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'Enrollment_Total_Race_Test' not found ``` ::: ::: Selected Populations Tidy ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current<-BPS_Selected_Pops_Current%>% select("School Name", contains("%"))%>% pivot_longer(c(2:6), names_to = "Select Population", values_to = "% Select Sending School") BPS_Selected_Pops_Current<-BPS_Selected_Pops_Current%>% mutate(`% Select Sending School` = `% Select Sending School`/100) BPS_Selected_Pops_Current<-BPS_Selected_Pops_Current%>% left_join(MS_Enrollment_Options, "School Name")%>% mutate(`%Select_Current_MS` = round(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment`*`% Select Sending School`,2))%>% mutate(`%Select_Proposed_MS` = round(`%MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`*`% Select Sending School`,2))%>% mutate(`%Select_Proposed_MS2` = round(`%MS_Proposed2_2026_Enrollment`*`% Select Sending School`,2)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in `mutate()`: ! Problem while computing `%Select_Current_MS = round(...)`. Caused by error in `mask$eval_all_mutate()`: ! object '%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: 2026 Projected Demographics using 2022 numbers ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # BPS_2026_Proposed_Demo<-BPS_Selected_Pops_Current%>% # left_join(Enrollment_Total_Race_Test, "School Name")%>% # mutate(`%Race_Current_MS` = round(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment`*`% Race Sending`,2))%>% # mutate(`%Select_Current_MS` = round(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment`*`% Select Sending School`,2))%>% # mutate(`%Race_Proposed_MS` = round(`%MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`*`% Race Sending`,2))%>% # mutate(`%Select_Proposed_MS` = round(`%MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`*`% Select Sending School`,2)) # # # BPS_2026_Proposed_Demo ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current%>% group_by(`Proposed MS2`, `Select Population`)%>% summarise(`%Select_Proposed_MS2` = sum(`%Select_Proposed_MS2`, na.rm=TRUE))%>% ggplot(aes(fill=`Proposed MS2`, y=`%Select_Proposed_MS2`, x=`Select Population`)) + geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity")+ labs(subtitle ="Morrison to South" , y = "Percentage of School", x= "Selected Population", title = "Projected %Select Populations 2026 Proposed Feeding Pattern 2", caption = "Using 2022-2023 Selected Population Numbers")+ theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=60,hjust=1))+ geom_text(aes(label = `%Select_Proposed_MS2`), vjust = 1.5, colour = "white", position = position_dodge(.9)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in `group_by()`: ! Must group by variables found in `.data`. ✖ Column `Proposed MS2` is not found. ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current%>% group_by(`Proposed MS`, `Select Population`)%>% summarise(`%Select_Proposed_MS` = sum(`%Select_Proposed_MS`, na.rm=TRUE))%>% ggplot(aes(fill=`Proposed MS`, y=`%Select_Proposed_MS`, x=`Select Population`)) + geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity")+ labs(subtitle ="Flaherty to South" , y = "Percentage of School", x= "Selected Population", title = "Projected %Select Populations 2026 Proposed Feeding Pattern", caption = "Using 2022-2023 Selected Population Numbers")+ theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=60,hjust=1))+ geom_text(aes(label = `%Select_Proposed_MS`), vjust = 1.5, colour = "white", position = position_dodge(.9)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in `group_by()`: ! Must group by variables found in `.data`. ✖ Column `Proposed MS` is not found. ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current%>% group_by(`Current MS`, `Select Population`)%>% summarise(`%Select_Current_MS` = sum(`%Select_Current_MS`, na.rm=TRUE))%>% ggplot(aes(fill=`Current MS`, y=`%Select_Current_MS`, x=`Select Population`)) + geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity")+ labs(subtitle ="No shift to feeding patterns" , y = "Percentage of School", x= "Selected Population", title = "Projected %Select Populations 2026 Current Feeding Pattern", caption = "Using 2022-2023 Selected Population Numbers")+ theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=60,hjust=1))+ geom_text(aes(label = `%Select_Current_MS`), vjust = 1.5, colour = "white", position = position_dodge(.9)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in `group_by()`: ! Must group by variables found in `.data`. ✖ Column `Current MS` is not found. ``` ::: ::: Academic Performance ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_MCAS_Current <- read_excel("_data/Braintree Public Schools/MCAS_Performance_2022.xlsx") #view(BPS_MCAS_Current) BPS_MCAS_Current<-BPS_MCAS_Current%>% mutate(`Current MS %Math` = round(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment`*`Math%Meet or Exceed`,2))%>% mutate(`Current MS %ELA` = round(`%MS_Current_2026_Enrollment`*`ELA%Meet or Exceed`,2))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS %Math` = round(`%MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`*`Math%Meet or Exceed`,2))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS %ELA` = round(`%MS_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`*`ELA%Meet or Exceed`,2))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS2 %Math` = round(`%MS2_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`*`Math%Meet or Exceed`,2))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS2 %ELA` = round(`%MS2_Proposed_2026_Enrollment`*`ELA%Meet or Exceed`,2)) BPS_MCAS_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} Current_MS_MCAS<-BPS_MCAS_Current%>% group_by(`Current MS`)%>% summarise(`Math% Meet or Exceed` = sum(`Current MS %Math`), `ELA% Meet or Exceed` = sum(`Current MS %ELA`))%>% pivot_longer(c(2:3), names_to = "MCAS", values_to = "Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed") Current_MS_MCAS ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} Current_MS_MCAS%>% ggplot(aes(fill=`Current MS`, y=`Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed`, x=`MCAS`)) + geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity")+ labs( y = "Projected Sending % Meeting or Exceeding", x= "MCAS Test", subtitle = "Current MS Feeding Pattern", title = "Predicted Sending MCAS Achievement", caption = "Projections using 2022 MCAS Results and Population Sizes")+ theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=60,hjust=1))+ geom_text(aes(label = `Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed`), vjust = 1.5, colour = "white", position = position_dodge(.9)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](BraintreePublicSchools_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: Proposed MS MCAS ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} Proposed_MS_MCAS<-BPS_MCAS_Current%>% group_by(`Proposed MS`)%>% summarise(`Math% Meet or Exceed` = sum(`Proposed MS %Math`), `ELA% Meet or Exceed` = sum(`Proposed MS %ELA`))%>% pivot_longer(c(2:3), names_to = "MCAS", values_to = "Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed") Proposed_MS_MCAS%>% ggplot(aes(fill=`Proposed MS`, y=`Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed`, x=`MCAS`)) + geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity")+ labs( subtitle = "Proposed MS: Flaherty to South", y = "Projected Sending % Meeting or Exceeding", x= "MCAS Test", title = "Predicted Sending MCAS Achievement", caption = "Projections using 2022 MCAS Results and Population Sizes")+ theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=60,hjust=1))+ geom_text(aes(label = `Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed`), vjust = 1.5, colour = "white", position = position_dodge(.9)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](BraintreePublicSchools_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} Proposed_MS2_MCAS<-BPS_MCAS_Current%>% group_by(`Proposed MS2`)%>% summarise(`Math% Meet or Exceed` = sum(`Proposed MS2 %Math`), `ELA% Meet or Exceed` = sum(`Proposed MS2 %ELA`))%>% pivot_longer(c(2:3), names_to = "MCAS", values_to = "Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed") Proposed_MS2_MCAS%>% ggplot(aes(fill=`Proposed MS2`, y=`Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed`, x=`MCAS`)) + geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity")+ labs( subtitle = "Proposed MS2: Morrison to South", y = "Projected % Meeting or Exceeding in Elementary", x= "MCAS Test", title = "Predicted Sending MCAS Achievement", caption = "Projections using 2022 MCAS Results and Population Sizes")+ theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=60,hjust=1))+ geom_text(aes(label = `Predicted Sending % Meet or Exceed`), vjust = 1.5, colour = "white", position = position_dodge(.9)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](BraintreePublicSchools_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
